mainboard.name: Severed Strands
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.

mainboard.name: Pitiless Pontiff
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: This creature gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

mainboard.name: Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis deals 1 damage to that player.
−2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.

mainboard.name: Tukatongue Thallid
mainboard.oracle_text: When this creature dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

mainboard.name: Eternal Witness
mainboard.oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Arasta of the Endless Web
mainboard.oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.

mainboard.name: Shineshadow Snarl
mainboard.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal a Plains or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

mainboard.name: Necroblossom Snarl
mainboard.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal a Swamp or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

mainboard.name: Woodland Champion
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever one or more tokens you control enter, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature.

mainboard.name: Dauntless Bodyguard
mainboard.oracle_text:
As this creature enters, choose another creature you control.
Sacrifice this creature: The chosen creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Whisper, Blood Liturgist
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Narrow Escape
mainboard.oracle_text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.

mainboard.name: Raise the Alarm
mainboard.oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

mainboard.name: Reveillark
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature leaves the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Evoke {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

mainboard.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Sprouting Renewal
mainboard.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Choose one —
• Create a 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature token with vigilance.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mainboard.name: Marsh Flats
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Goldenglow Moth
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever this creature blocks, you may gain 4 life.

mainboard.name: Fungal Infection
mainboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

mainboard.name: Vampire Hexmage
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Sacrifice this creature: Remove all counters from target permanent.

mainboard.name: Mavren Fein, Dusk Apostle
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

mainboard.name: Kalastria Highborn
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever this creature or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

mainboard.name: Isolated Chapel
mainboard.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

mainboard.name: Festering Mummy
mainboard.oracle_text: When this creature dies, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

mainboard.name: Quest for the Gravelord
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

mainboard.name: Cruel Celebrant
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever this creature or another creature or planeswalker you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Cloudgoat Ranger
mainboard.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, create three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens.
Tap three untapped Kithkin you control: This creature gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

mainboard.name: The Binding of the Titans
mainboard.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Each player mills three cards.
II — Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. For each creature card exiled this way, you gain 1 life.
III — Return target creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.
